                      java.lang.String strategies,

        Initializes the Game Manager with number of players
        Parameters:
        numberOfPlayers - tells numbers of players going to play the game
        strategies - is the comma separated string example b,r,c
        isGameAutomated - to check if the game should be automated

      • getUIState

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getUIState​()
